name: Technology in Education
description: Discuss impacts of technology on modern learning

questions.text: What is your favorite technology tool for study?
How often do you use online learning platforms?
What are some challenges of online learning?
What are some benefits of online learning?
What are some drawbacks of online learning?
Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of online learning.
Do you agree technology improves education quality? Why?
Do you agree technology improves learning outcomes? Why?
Do you agree technology improves learning experience? Why?

4.announcement: Your school will organize a seminar about AI in education.

questions.text: What would you say to invite students?
What benefits will students get from joining?
